title: Artifacts
subtitle: Manage your build artifacts and packages

welcome.loginRequired: Please log in to view and manage your build artifacts.

upload.title: Upload New Artifact
upload.distributionHelp: Choose the distribution this artifact belongs to.
upload.customPathHelp: Leave empty to use the original filename.

delete.title: Confirm Deletion
delete.confirmSingle: Are you sure you want to delete "{{ name }}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirmMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} artifacts? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No artifacts found
empty.description: Click "New Artifact" to upload your first artifact.

errors.storageNotConfigured: Storage service is not configured on the server.
